tagline: Browser user scripts for Firefox, Chrome, Opera, Safari.
body: Browser [user scripts](http://wiki.greasespot.net/User_script) for Firefox (requires [Greasemonkey](https://github.com/greasemonkey/greasemonkey) or [Scriptish](https://github.com/scriptish/scriptish)), Chrome, Opera, Safari (requires [NinjaKit](https://github.com/os0x/NinjaKit)).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Userscripts
